name: Grand City Extreme Driving Simulator
description:
Grand City Extreme Driving Simulator

Grand City Extreme Driving Simulator!
Do you want to try a Grand City Extreme Driving Simulatorr? You can drive like a real sport simulator for free.
Using the best advanced physics engine and smooth camera controls, realistic car and wonderful music.
This is completely realistic car game fiction you will feel you are driving like a real car with wonderful different type beautiful tracks.
If your car touch any other vehicles or any characters of game then your game will be over.
Have Fun and get maximum points as true Hero in your Free Grand City Extreme Driving Simulator Game.
Try crossing the street in different scenarios and difficulties. Avoid cars, vans, trucks and all kinds of obstacles that you find on the road.
see if you'll play as well as you did it.

key features:

- Simple, pure, innovative game play
- Free to play on Google Play Store.
- Easy to controlling
- Amazing 3D graphics
